hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #8# major items.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Wallet#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple After Wind Enemy Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Darunia's dance# leads to #the Claim Check#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: I was voted least helpful hint stone five years in a row!

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path to #the Tower#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #the Serenade of Water#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: Save your future, end the Happy Mask Salesman.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that a single #scrub in the crater# sells #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #riding the bean in Lake Hylia# leads to...^ #the Gerudo Card# and #the Water Temple Boss Key#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that ##Zora's Fountain## has #1# major item.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Mirror Shield#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path to #the Key#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: Did you know that the Kokiri Sword is as effective as Deku Sticks against Dead Hand?

ToT (Right).text: They say that plundering #Kokiri Forest# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #a Wallet# can be found on #the Death Mountain Trail#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path to #Barinade#.
